plugins.name: sociology-writing-suite
plugins.description: Complete academic writing toolkit for sociology research with 19 integrated skills. Use research-coordinator to orchestrate the full workflow (now with project-scaffold for standardized project structure and progress tracking). Skills: Zotero integration (zotero, zotero-rag), literature review (lit-search, lit-synthesis, reading-agent, argument-builder), qualitative analysis (interview-analyst, interview-writeup), manuscript drafting (methods-writer, case-justification, interview-bookends, abstract-builder), revision support (verifier, peer-reviewer, revision-coordinator, writing-editor, bibliography-builder), and meta-skills (genre-skill-builder, project-scaffold).
